entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 19. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Hazy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 May 2016
